title: Arabian Nights
description: Set in the 1890's. Raymond Doyle is send to Arabia only to meet Bodie, Sheik of the area's dominating group of Beduouin. A deal is made between the two men in exchange for another's life, but the bond created by their words is only the beginning of their exciting attraction.Arabian Nights is a slash AU Professionals novel by Pamela Rose, originally published by Manacles Press and later put online at the Professionals Circuit Archive. It's 172 pages, 620 K, and circa 113,000 words long.
author: Pamela   Rose
